attributes.founder: '''Crakehall''' is a stronghold in the Westerlands. It is the seat of House Crakehall, bannermen to House Lannister of Casterly Rock. Located on the Searoad, close to the shores of the Sunset Sea, south of Casterly Rock and Lannisport and close to the border of the Westerlands and the Reach.<ref>http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/crakehall/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Crakehall entry</ref>==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, Crakehall is the seat of House Crakehall.==See also==* AWOIAF==References==ReflistThe WesterlandsCategory:CastlesCategory:Locations in the WesterlandsCategory:House CrakehallCategory:Locations

'''Crakehall''' is a stronghold in [[the Westerlands]]. It is the seat of [[House Crakehall]], bannermen to [[House Lannister]] of [[Casterly Rock]]. Located on the [[Searoad]], close to the shores of the [[Sunset Sea]], south of Casterly Rock and [[Lannisport]] and close to the border of the [[Westerlands]] and [[the Reach]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/crakehall/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Crakehall entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Crakehall is the seat of House Crakehall.
